hero.title: Gzip Explorer
hero.subtitle: View Git Projects from .zip
hero.description: A powerful and elegant tool designed to let you explore git repositories offline by importing .zip archives, with a fast, beautiful read-only code editor and markdown support.

directory.title: Quick Directory Navigation
directory.description: Navigate imported git projects effortlessly with a clean file tree view, supporting deep folder structures and instant file access for seamless offline browsing.

pluginmanager.title: Dedicated Plugin Manager
pluginmanager.description: Extend and customize the app with a built-in plugin system. Enable or disable powerful features like advanced editor options, theme customizer, and more to suit your needs.

markdown.title: Markdown Preview Support
markdown.description: View READMEs and any .md files with beautiful, rendered markdown previews, complete with tables, code blocks, images, and formatting for clear documentation reading.

codeeditor.title: View in Code Editor
codeeditor.description: Open source files in a fast, syntax-highlighted read-only code editor optimized for viewing, with line numbers, search, and smooth scrolling across all languages.

editoroptions.title: Advanced Editor Options
editoroptions.description: Fine-tune your viewing experience with customizable font size, font family, zoom controls, line height, and warnings for unsupported characters.

theme.title: Customizable Theme
theme.description: Choose from light, dark, or specialized e-Ink modes, with full support for custom primary, secondary, and accent colors to match your preference and reduce eye strain.

direct.title: Direct Download
direct.note: Note: iOS and macOS versions require manual signing or developer account

footer.description: View git Projects in mobile without setting up git
